name: scrappy
effect: This Pokémon ignores ghost-type Pokémon's immunity to normal- and fighting-type moves. Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.
short_effect: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.

flavor_text.x_y: Makes Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Makes Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
